question: What percentage of currently available drugs are metabolized by CYP3A4?
ideal_answer: CYP3A4 metabolizes approximately 50% of the drugs available today on the market.

snippets.text: Among CYP enzymes, CYP3A4 and CYP2D6 are the most relevant since they metabolize about 50% and 30% of the drugs on the market, respectively.
